name: Adversary
description: Upgrade the difficulty of any combat check targeting this character once per rank.

name: Animal Empathy
description: When attempting to handle or tame animals, add :force: no greater than Force rating to the check and spend :lightside: to add :success: or :advantage:.

name: Ataru Technique
description: When making a check using the Lightsaber skill, may use Agility instead of Brawn.

name: Bacta Specialist
description: Patients heal additional wounds per rank when they heal wounds from bacta tanks or long-term care.

name: Barrage
description: Add 1 damage per rank to all Gunnery and Ranged attacks at Medium or Long range.

name: Black Market Contacts
description: Decrease rarity of sought item by one per rank when looking on the black market; item’s cost is increased by 50%.

name: Blooded
description: Add :boost::boost: to all checks to resist or recover from venoms, poisons, and toxins; reduce duration of ongoing effects from poisons, venoms, and toxins by two rounds, to a minimum of one.

name: Body Guard
description: Once per round, may suffer 1 Strain per rank to take the Body Guard maneuver to protect an engaged ally; until the end of the character’s next turn, upgrade the difficulty of all combat checks targeting the protected ally once per Strain spent.

name: Bought Info
description: Instead of making a Knowledge check, may take a Bought Info action to spend credits equal to 50 times the difficulty of the check to pass with one :success:.

name: Bypass Security
description: Remove :setback: from any Computers or Skulduggery check to bypass security.

name: Circle of Shelter
description: When an engaged ally suffers a hit, may use Parry or Reflect incidental against the hit.

name: Clever Solution
description: Once per session, make one skill check using Cun­ning rather than the characteristic linked to that skill.

name: Codebreaker
description: Remove :setback: per rank from checks made to break codes or decrypt communications; decrease difficulty of checks made to break codes or decrypt commu­nications by 1.

name: Command
description: Add :boost: per rank to Leadership checks; affected targets add :boost: per rank to Discipline checks for the next 24 hours.

name: Commanding Presence
description: Remove :setback: per rank from all Leadership checks.

name: Confidence
description: Decrease difficulty of Discipline checks to avoid fear by 1 per rank.

name: Congenial
description: May suffer 1 Strain per rank to downgrade the difficulty of Charm or Negotiation checks by one per Strain spent or upgrade difficulty once per Strain spent when targetted by Charm or Negotiaion checks.

name: Contraption
description: Once per session, as an action, may make a :hard: Mechanics check to fashion a device to solve a current problem using just hte tools and parts on hand.

name: Convincing Demeanor
description: Remove :setback: per rank from any Deception or Skulduggery check.

name: Coordinated Assault
description: As a maneuver, may grant a number of allies equal to ranks in Leadership in Engaged range :advantage: to all combat checks until the beginning of next turn; increase range per rank.

name: Crippling Blow
description: May increase difficulty of attack by 1. If suc­cessful, target suffers 1 Strain when moving for remainder of encounter.

name: Deadly Accuracy
description: Adds ranks in Brawl to all damage inflicted with claws.

name: Defensive Driving
description: Increase defence of vehicle or starship being piloted by 1 per rank.

name: Defensive Slicing
description: When defending computer systems, add :setback: per rank to opponents’ checks.

name: Disorient
description: After hitting with a combat check, may spend :advantage::advantage: to disorient target for 1 round per rank.

name: Draw Closer
description: Perform Draw Closer action; make a Lightsaber (Willpow­er) combat check against one Silhouette 1 target within Medium range, adding :force: no greater than Force rating to check. Spend :lightside: to move target one range band closer or to add :success: to check.

name: Drive Back
description: Spend :triumph: or :advantage::advantage::advantage: on a missed Brawl, Lightsaber, or Melee combat check to force the target to make a move maneuver in a direc­tion of the character’s choice.

name: Durable
description: Subtract 10 per rank from Critical Injury rolls made against the character.

name: Enhanced Leader
description: Add :force: equal to Force rating to Leadership checks; spend :lightside: to add :success: or :advantage: to the result.

name: Expert Tracker
description: Remove :setback: per rank from checks to find tracks or track targets; decrease time to track a target by 50%.

name: Fearsome
description: May force Engaged opponents to make a fear check with the difficulty equal to ranks in Fearsome.

name: Feral Strength
description: +1 damage per rank on all Brawl and Melee attacks.

name: Field Commander
description: As an action, may make an :average: Leadership check; a number of allies equal to Presence may immediately suffer 1 Strain to perform a free maneuver.

name: Improved Field Commander
description: As an action, may make an :average: Leadership check; a number of allies equal to Presence may immediately suffer 1 Strain to perform a free maneuver; spend :triumph: to allow one ally to perform an action instead.

name: Fine Tuning
description: Repair an additional System Strain per rank when repairing ships or vehicles.

name: Fire Control
description: Take the Fire Control action; all combat checks made from current starship or vehicle count their target’s silhouette as one higher than nor­mal until the beginning of next turn.

name: Forager
description: Remove up to :setback::setback: from skill checks to find food, water, or shelter; Suvival checks take half the time.

name: Force Rating
description: Roll :force: per rank to activate Force powers.

name: Form on Me
description: A number of allies equal to ranks in Leadership in Close range gain the benefits of the Gain the Advantage action.

name: Full Throttle
description: Take a Full Throttle action and make a :hard: Piloting (Space or Planetary) check to increase a vehicle’s top speed by 1 for three rounds.

name: Improved Full Throttle
description: Suffer one Strain to make an :average: Piloting: Planetary check as maneuver and in­crease top speed by 1 for a number of rounds equal to Cunning.

name: Galaxy Mapper
description: Remove :setback: per rank from all Astrogation checks; Astrogation checks take 25% less time per rank.

name: Gang Leader
description: May spend a maneuver giving orders to other posse mem­bers within medium range, granting them :boost: on their next check.

name: Gearhead
description: Remove :setback: per rank from Mechanics checks.

name: Greased Palms
description: Before making a social check, may spend up to 50 cred­its per rank to upgrade the ability of the check once per 50 credits spent.

name: Hawk Bat Swoop
description: May perform a Light­saber: Agility melee combat check against one target within short range and add :force: no greater than Force Rating to the pool. The character may spend :lightside: before resolving the success or failure of the check to engage the target immediately as an inci­dental, and may spend :lightside: to add :advantage: to the check. If the character cannot move to engage the target, the attack automatically misses.

name: Heightened Awareness
description: Allies within Short range add :boost: to Perception and Vigilance checks; allies in Engaged range add :boost::boost: instead.

name: Hold Together
description: Flip one Destiny Point to make a Hold Together incidental immediately after a starship takes damage to convert the suffered Hull Trauma to System Strain.

name: Hunter
description: Add :boost: per rank to all skill checks when interacting with wild beasts and animals, including combat checks. This character adds +10 per rank to all Criti­cal Injury rolls against animals.

name: Hunter’s Quarry
description: As an action make a :hard: Sur­vival check to upgrade the ability of all attacks against one target at long range until the end of the big game hunter’s next turn.

name: Imbue Item
description: Spend a maneuver to com­mit :force: and grant one weapon at short range + 1 dam­age or decrease critical rating of weapon by one.

name: Indistinguishable
description: Opposing characters upgrade the difficulty of any checks made to identify the character once per rank.

name: Inspiring Rhetoric
description: As an action, may make an :average: Leadership check; each :success: removes one Strain or Wound from one ally in Short range; spend :advantage: to remove an additional Strain or Wound from an affected ally.

name: Improved Inspiring Rhetoric
description: As an action, may make an :average: Leadership check; each :success: removes one Strain or Wound from one ally in Short range; spend :advantage: to remove an additional Strain or Wound from an affected ally; all affected allies add :boost: to all checks for two rounds.

name: Supreme Inspiring Rhetoric
description: As a maneuver, may make an :average: Leadership check; each :success: removes one Strain or Wound from one ally in Short range; spend :advantage: to remove an additional Strain or Wound from an affected ally; all affected allies add :boost: to all checks for four rounds.

name: Intense Focus
description: Suffer 1 Strain to upgrade any skill check once.

name: Intimidating
description: May suffer up to 1 Strain per rank to downgrade the difficulty of a Coercion check a number of times equal to the Strain suffered; when targeted by Coercion, they may suffer up to 1 Strain per rank to upgrade the difficulty of the opponent’s check a number of times equal to the strain suffered.

name: Intuitive Evasion
description: As a ma­neuver, suffer 1 strain and commit :force: to upgrade the difficulty of all combat checks targeting pilot’s vehicle once, until the beginning of pilot’s next turn.

name: Intuitive Improvements
description: When mak­ing a check to repair or craft an item, may add Force dice upt to Force Rating to the check. Spend :lightside::lightside: to permanently increase the item’s hard points by 1.

name: Intuitive Navigation
description: Add :advantage: to all Astrogation checks.

name: Jump Up
description: Once per round, may stand from seated or prone as an incidental.

name: Kill with Kindness
description: Remove :setback: per rank from all Charm and Leadership checks.

name: Knockdown
description: May spend :triumph: to knock target prone with successful melee attack.

name: Know Somebody
description: Once per session, when attempting to purchase a legally available item, reduce its rarity by 1 per rank.

name: Known Schematic
description: Once per session, may perform the Known Schematic Maneuver; make a :hard: Knowledge (Education) check; success grants familiarity with a building or ship’s design.

name: Let’s Ride
description: May mount or dismount from a creature as an incidental.

name: Lethal Blows
description: Add +10 per rank to Critical In­jury rolls against opponents.

name: Loom
description: When an Engaged ally makes a successful Charm, Deception, or Negotia­tion check, add :advantage: per rank in Coercion to the check.

name: Master Grenadier
description: Decrease the :advantage: cost to activate the Blast quality of any weapon used by 1 to a minimum of 1.

name: Master Pilot
description: Once per round, suffer 2 Strain to perform one Pilot ac­tion as a maneuver.

name: Natural Brawler
description: Once per session, may reroll any one Brawl or Melee check.

name: Natural Charmer
description: Once per session, may reroll any one Charm or Deception check.

name: Natural Driver
description: Once per session, may reroll any one Piloting: Planetary or Gunnery check.

name: Natural Hunter
description: Once per session, may reroll any one Perception or Vigilance check.

name: Natural Leader
description: Once per session, may reroll any one Cool or Leadership check.

name: Natural Negotiator
description: Once per session, may reroll any one Cool or Negotiation check.

name: Natural Pilot
description: Once per session, may reroll any one Piloting (Space) or Gun­nery check.

name: Natural Programmer
description: Once per session, may reroll any one Comput­ers or Astrogation check.

name: Natural Rogue
description: Once per ses­sion, may reroll any one Skulduggery or Stealth check.

name: Niman Technique
description: May use Willpower instead of Brawn when mak­ing lightsaber checks.

name: Nobody’s Fool
description: Upgrade difficulty of Charm, Coercion, and Deception checks targeting the character once per rank.

name: On-board Processor
description: No external droid controller needed

name: Outdoorsman
description: Remove :setback: per rank from checks to move through terrain or manage environmental effects; reduce overland travel times by 50%.

name: Parry
description: When struck by a melee attack but before applying Soak, suffer 3 Strain to reduce damage by 2 plus ranks in Parry.

name: Improved Parry
description: When struck by a melee attack but before applying Soak, suffer 3 Strain to reduce damage by 2 plus ranks in Parry; if the attack generates :despair: or :threat::threat::threat:, inflict an automatic hit with lightsaber, dealing base damage.

name: Pin
description: As an action upon a successful opposed Athletics check against an engaged opponent, immobilise that opponent until the end of the attacker’s next turn; may spend :triumph: on check to increase duration one round.

name: Plausible Deniability
description: Remove :setback: per rank from all Coercion and Deception checks.

name: Point Blank
description: Add 1 damage per rank to all Ranged (Heavy) and Ranged (Light) attacks made at Short or Engaged range.

name: Powerful Blast
description: Increase Blast damage dealt by explosives, explosive weapons, and grenades by +1 per rank.

name: Precise Aim
description: Once per round, may perform Precise Aim maneuver to suffer upto 1 Strain per rank to reduce target’s melee and ranged defences by Strain spent.

name: Quick Draw
description: May draw or holster a weapon as an incidental.

name: Quick Strike
description: When performing a combat check, add :boost: per rank against any target that has not yet acted in the encounter.

name: Rapid Reaction
description: May suffer 1 Strain to add :success: to any Vigilance or Cool check to determin initia­tive order.

name: Reflect
description: When struck by a ranged attack but before apply­ing Soak, suffer 3 Strain to reduce damage by 2 plus ranks in Reflect.

name: Improved Reflect
description: When struck by a ranged attack but before apply­ing Soak, suffer 3 Strain to reduce damage by 2 plus ranks in Reflect; if the attack generates :despair: or :threat::threat::threat:, inflict an automatic hit on one target in Medium range, with the damage of the original hit.

name: Researcher
description: Remove :setback: from all Knowledge checks; researching a subject takes half the time.

name: Resolve
description: When suffering Strain, reduce the amount suffered by one per rank, to a minimum of 1.

name: Ritual Caster
description: Must spend a maneuver before using any Force powers. In addition, may only use the Foresee power out­ doors and at night.

name: Saber Throw
description: Make a Lightsaber check against a target within Medium range, adding :force: up to Force rating: spend :lightside: for attack to succeed and :lightside: for lightsaber to return to hand.

name: Scathing Tirade
description: May spend an action to make an :average: Coercion check; each :success: causes one enemy in Short range to suffer 1 Strain. Spend :advantage: to cause 1 affected enemy to suffer 1 additional Strain.

name: Improved Scathing Tirade
description: As an action, may make an :average: Coercion check; each :success: inflicts 1 Strain on a target in Short range. Spend :advantage: to inflict 1 additional Strain on one affected target; all affected targets suffer :setback: to all checks for a number of rounds equal to ranks in Coercion.

name: Second Chances
description: Once per encounter, may choose 2 positive dice in one check and reroll them.

name: Selective Detonation
description: When using a weapon with the Blast quality, spend :advantage: to exclude 1 target that would normally be affected by the explosion.

name: Sense Danger
description: Once per session, remove :setback::setback: from any check.

name: Sense Emotions
description: Add :boost: to all Charm, Coercion, and Deception checks unless the target is immune to Force powers.

name: Shortcut
description: During a chase, add :boost: per rank to any checks made to catch or escape an opponent.

name: Side Step
description: As a maneuver may suffer 1 Strain per rank to upgrade the difficulty of all ranged attacks targeting this character by 1 per Strain spent until the start of the character’s next turn.

name: Skilled Jockey
description: Remove :setback: per rank from all Pilot checks.

name: Smooth Talker (Charm)
description: When making Charm checks, spend :triumph: to gain additional :success: per rank.

name: Smooth Talker (Coercion)
description: When making Coercion checks, spend :triumph: to gain additional :success: per rank.

name: Smooth Talker (Deception)
description: When making Deception checks, spend :triumph: to gain additional :success: per rank.

name: Smooth Talker (Negotiation)
description: When making Negotiation checks, spend :triumph: to gain additional :success: per rank.

name: Sniper Shot
description: Reduce difficulty of combat checks at Long or Extreme range by 1.

name: Soft Spot
description: After a successful attack with a non-starship/vehicle weapon, may spend a Destiny Point to add Cunning rating to damage for one hit.

name: Spare Clip
description: Does not run out of ammo on :despair:.

name: Stalker
description: Add :boost: per rank to all Coordination and Stealth checks.

name: Stroke of Genius
description: Once per session, may substitute Intellect characteristic on a skill check.

name: Strong Arm
description: Treat thrown weapons as if they had one step greater in range, to a mximum of Medium range.

name: Stunning Blow
description: May inflict damage as Strain instead of Wounds; does not ignore soak

name: Improved Stunning Blow
description: May inflict strain instead of wounds; may spend :triumph: on Brawl checks to stagger target for 1 round per :triumph:.

name: Surgeon
description: When making a Medicine check to help a character heal wounds, the target heals an additional Wound per rank.

name: Swift
description: Do not suffer usual pen­alties for moving through difficult terrain.

name: Targeted Blow
description: After making a suc­cessful attack, may spend one Destiny Point to add damage equal to Agility to one hit.

name: Technical Aptitude
description: Reduce the amount of time to complete computer-related tasks by 25% per rank.

name: The Force is My Ally
description: Once per session may suffer 2 Strain to perform one Force power as a maneuver.

name: Time to Go
description: Spend 1 Destiny Point to perform a Move maneuver as an incidental to attempt to move into cover or out of Blast range of a weapon or explosion.

name: Touch of Fate
description: Once per game session, may add :boost::boost: to any one skill check.

name: Uncanny Reactions
description: Add :boost: per rank to all Vigilance checks.

name: Uncanny Senses
description: Add :boost: per rank to all Perception checks.

name: Wheel and Deal
description: When selling goods legally, gain 10% more credits per rank.

name: Works Like a Charm
description: Once per session, the character may make one skill check using Presence, rather than the characteristic linked to that skill.
